title: npm の EACCES permission denied を直す
desc: 直近投稿(30日以内)を10〜20件集約し、原因→手順→FAQでまとめた対処ガイド

sources.title: Not able to install
[BUG] Termux: Background tasks fail with malformed path - HOME sanitization breaks on deep paths
Task agent fails on Termux: EACCES permission denied for /tmp/claude
[Feature Request] Add side-by-side diff display in terminal output
v0.0.73 issue with install for claude on fresh install of terminal-jarvis
[BUG] Windows Native Version Not Working
failed to run gemini -s -p "run shell command: env | grep SANDBOX"
permission denied with sandbox mode
npm install error in macOS15.7.3
Use official Claude Code installation method
Unable to create connection to database due to local file system permission limit
[Bug?]: Mysterious `Internal Error` message with no clues
How to install Yarn with mise version manager?
How to solve electron-prebuilt-compile build and install error
PNPM/NPM Overrides Resolution Logic
HTTP Toolkit setting invalid NODE_OPTIONS
turborepo installation errors(giving offline even tho I have a good internet)
On my `package.json` exports, I want to match something like `lib/**/*.js`, is this possible?
What it the C#/.NET/NuGet equivalent of peer dependencies of npm?
The system cannot find the path specified. Error: Cannot find module

replies.draft: I put together a step-by-step checklist that consolidates the common root causes and fixes for this kind of issue (with commands/log examples). If it matches your situation, it may help: https://mikann20041029.github.io/solve-github-20260121-npm-eacces-permission-denied/ (no hard sell — just a practical guide).
